explanation: The correct option is 'Avec ce nouveau guide de jardinage, mon voisin comprendra enfin comment cultiver ses légumes' - With this new gardening guide, my neighbor will finally understand how to grow his vegetables. This listening exercise tests future 'comprendra' vs present 'comprend' vs imperfect 'comprenait', and possessive 'ses' vs demonstrative 'ces'.
